sentences: Me oleme kirjutanud kõik ülesanded ära.
context: The word 'kirjutanud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'kirjutama', which means 'to write'. It indicates that an action of writing has been completed. This form is commonly used in perfect tenses and can be translated as 'written', 'has written', or 'have written' depending on the context and subject.
